string-array.item: Wishing you a day filled with happiness and a year filled with joy. Happy birthday!
Tis the season to wish one another joy and love and peace. Merry Christmas.
Warmest greetings of this festive season and best wishes for happiness this New Year.
I love Easter. It’s a time for eating all the chocolate you can find with complete impunity! Have a delicious Easter.
Wishing you the gift of faith and the blessing of hope this thanksgiving day!
Spooks, treats, and yummy eats. Wishing you the best Halloween ever!
I’m not texting you any kind of jokes today, because our friendship is already a one giant joke. I love you anyway. But I do think that we need to be more serious from time to time. Behave.
